mapper.select: select * from (select rownum, id, member_id as memberId, title, datetime, replies, likes, views from post where category = #{category} order by id desc) OFFSET (#{pageDto.currentPage}-1)*#{pageDto.limit} + 1 ROWS FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY
select id, member_id as memberId, title, datetime, replies, likes, views from post where (${searchCol} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND (category = #{category}) order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into post ( id, member_id, category, title, content ) values ( seq_post.nextval, #{memberId}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content} )
